price: তেওঁ ক’লে, ‘মই মোৰ প্ৰতিপালকৰ ওচৰলৈ গৈ আছোঁ, নিশ্চয় তেৱেঁই মোক হিদায়ত কৰিব,
arabic: وَقَالَ إِنِّي ذَاهِبٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّي سَيَهۡدِينِ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: waqāla innī dhāhibun ilā rabbī sayahdīni
